name: Pala Lasagna [DEMO]
description:
Jon... I require assets Pala Lasagna is an experiment made by me with contributions from a friend. 
  • The dimensions of the project were larger than expected. Art became very time demanding, and other attractive (and more suited to my limitations) game ideas
  • Maybe i´ll continue developing this game in the future, if i can hire a 2D artist, or find some spare time.
  • The game is meant to be short, but very hard.
  • Expect to a very clunky gameplay, sorry about that.
  • Anyways, i hope you like the concept.
  • Feel free to give your opinion / feedback
